price: Maka tidak adalah keluhan mereka di waktu datang kepada mereka siksaan Kami, kecuali mengatakan, "Sesungguhnya kami adalah orang-orang yang zalim".
arabic: فَمَا كَانَ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ إِذۡ جَآءَهُم بَأۡسُنَآ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: famā kāna daʿwāhum idh jāahum basunā illā an qālū innā kunnā ẓālimīna
